query:
SELECT SUBSTRING(content, LOCATE('| Career Stage |', content), 500) as table_section 
FROM blog_posts 
WHERE slug = 'expert-cv-help-for-crafting-winning-resumes-effortlessly'
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user ijVUtDru4Z9cqPT.98f765e38313 --database YeXpL2RbTVxqVQqhWQzraf --execute SELECT SUBSTRING(content, LOCATE('| Career Stage |', content), 500) as table_section 
FROM blog_posts 
WHERE slug = 'expert-cv-help-for-crafting-winning-resumes-effortlessly'

rows.table_section: | Career Stage | Ideal Length | Why This Length Works |
| Graduate / Entry Level | 1–2 pages | Focuses on education, internships, and foundational skills. |
| Early to Mid-Career | 2–3 pages | Effectively balances detailed experience with demonstrated impact. |
